list_order.title: Iron Man
list_order.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

list_order.title: The Incredible Hulk
list_order.description: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper

list_order.title: Iron Man 2
list_order.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his fathers legacy.

list_order.title: Thor
list_order.description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard, where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

list_order.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
list_order.description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a Super-Soldier serum.

new_releases.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
new_releases.description: Against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro-futuristic world, Marvel's First Family is forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond.

tv_series.title: Agatha All Along
tv_series.description: Agatha Harkness gathers a coven of witches and sets off down, down, down The Witches' Road.

tv_series.title: Moon Knight
tv_series.description: Steven Grant discovers he's been granted the powers of an Egyptian moon god.

tv_series.title: Loki
tv_series.description: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief.

tv_series.title: WandaVision
tv_series.description: Blends the style of classic sitcoms with the MCU in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision live idealized suburban lives.

tv_series.title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
tv_series.description: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame, Sam Wilson and Bucky Barnes team up in a global adventure.

tv_series.title: Hawkeye
tv_series.description: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop.

in_order.title: Man of Steel
in_order.description: An alien child is evacuated from his dying world and sent to Earth to live among humans. His peace is threatened when other survivors of his home planet invade Earth.

in_order.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
in_order.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

in_order.title: Suicide Squad
in_order.description: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force.

in_order.title: Wonder Woman
in_order.description: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

in_order.title: Justice League
in_order.description: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

in_order.title: Aquaman
in_order.description: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

in_order.title: Shazam!
in_order.description: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

in_order.title: Birds of Prey
in_order.description: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroines Black Canary, Huntress, and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

in_order.title: The Suicide Squad
in_order.description: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker, and a collection of nutty cons join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X.

in_order.title: Black Adam
in_order.description: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods, Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb.

in_order.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
in_order.description: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word SHAZAM!, is transformed into his adult superhero alter ego.

in_order.title: Blue Beetle
in_order.description: An alien scarab chooses Jaime Reyes to be its symbiotic host, bestowing the recent college graduate with a suit of armor capable of extraordinary powers.

in_order.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
in_order.description: Black Manta seeks revenge on Aquaman for his father's death. To defend Atlantis, Aquaman forges an alliance with his imprisoned brother.

new_releases.title: Superman
new_releases.description: Superman must reconcile his alien Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as reporter Clark Kent.

new_releases.title: Joker: Folie Ã  Deux
new_releases.description: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harley Quinn, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital.

new_releases.title: Joker
new_releases.description: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City.

new_releases.title: The Batman
new_releases.description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption.

batman.title: The Batman
batman.description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption.

batman.title: Batman Begins
batman.description: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice.

batman.title: The Dark Knight
batman.description: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must work to put an end to the madness.

batman.title: The Dark Knight Rises
batman.description: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

batman.title: Batman (1989)
batman.description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

batman.title: Batman Returns
batman.description: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin, a female employee becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

batman.title: Batman Forever
batman.description: Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes Robin.

batman.title: Batman & Robin
batman.description: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.
